User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system with access to specific functionalities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity. (Same as Firebase Auth UID)

Promotora.title: Promotora
Promotora.description: Represents a promoter or intermediary that banks can be associated with.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the promotora was created.

BankStatus.title: BankStatus
BankStatus.description: Represents the status of a bank proposal insertion for a specific user.

customId.description: Optional custom identifier for the bank.

promotoraId.description: Optional foreign key to the Promotora entity.

categories.description: Categories of the bank (e.g., CLT, FGTS, GOV, INSS, Inserção, Sem Info).

status.description: Current status of the proposal insertion.

insertionDate.description: Timestamp when the proposal was marked as 'Concluído'.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the bank status was created.

CLTRule.title: CLTRule
CLTRule.description: Represents a specific business rule for CLT calculations or validations, associated with a specific bank.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CLT Rule.

ruleName.description: The name or title of the rule (e.g., 'Tempo de Admissão').

ruleValue.description: The value or condition for the rule (e.g., '6 meses').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the rule was created.

ActivityLog.title: ActivityLog
ActivityLog.description: Represents a single log entry for an action taken within the application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the log entry.

description.description: A human-readable description of the activity.

userEmail.description: Email of the user who performed the action.

AccessDetails.title: AccessDetails
AccessDetails.description: Stores user-specific, private access details for a bank or promotora, like links and credentials.

id.description: Unique identifier, same as the bankId or promotoraId.

password.description: The password for this login. Stored in plaintext.

requiresToken.description: Indicates if a token is required for login.

tokenResponsible.description: The name of the person responsible for the token.

isRobo.description: Indicates if access is via a robot.

roboResponsible.description: The name of the person responsible for the robot.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including their role. Secured by requiring `request.auth.uid == userId`.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores the user-specific checklist status for each bank. Each user can only access their own checklist.

params.name: checklistId
params.description: The unique identifier for the bank checklist entry, likely matching the bankStatusId.

definition.description: Stores user-specific, private access details for each bank. A user can only access their own details.

params.name: accessId
params.description: The unique identifier for the bank access detail entry, matching the bankId.

definition.description: Stores user-specific, private access details for each promotora. A user can only access their own details.

params.name: accessId
params.description: The unique identifier for the promotora access detail entry, matching the promotoraId.

definition.description: Stores the master list of promotoras. Writable only by 'master' role, readable by all authenticated users.

params.name: promotoraId
params.description: The unique identifier for the promotora.

definition.description: Stores the master list of banks available in the system. Writable only by 'master' role, readable by all authenticated users.

params.name: bankStatusId
params.description: The unique identifier for the bank status entry.

definition.description: Stores CLT rules for a specific bank. Writable only by 'master' role, readable by all authenticated users.

params.name: ruleId
params.description: The unique identifier for the CLT rule.

definition.description: Stores a log of all important activities within the application. Readable by all authenticated users, writable only via server-side logic (enforced by security rules allowing only create).

params.name: logId
params.description: The unique identifier for the log entry.
